headline: Prediction: Amazon Stock Will Beat the Market. Here's Why.
summary: Online sales growth does not have a significant effect on Amazon's overall performance.  The law of large numbers may be a reason why overall revenue growth is in the single digits.  A surprisingly low valuation could help boost Amazon stock longer term.

raw.headline: Prediction: Amazon Stock Will Beat the Market. Here's Why.
raw.summary: Online sales growth does not have a significant effect on Amazon's overall performance.  The law of large numbers may be a reason why overall revenue growth is in the single digits.  A surprisingly low valuation could help boost Amazon stock longer term.

headline: NSC Invests $300,000 in Next-Generation Solutions for Safer Workplaces
summary: The National Safety Council awarded $300,000 to the 2025-2026 Research to Solutions (R2S) and MSD Solutions Pilot Grant recipients, bringing the total investment in musculoskeletal disorders (MSDs) prevention to nearly $850,000 over three years.

headline: Microsoft Stock Is an AI Winner. Wall Street Isn’t ‘Fully Appreciating the Growth Story.’
summary: As  Microsoft  hits its stride in artificial-intelligence monetization, many on Wall Street aren’t paying close enough attention, Wedbush says.  Microsoft’s  AI-equipped Azure was a standout in the fiscal third quarter: Revenue from the cloud computing platform and other cloud services surged 33% year over year.  “We strongly view this as Microsoft’s ‘shining moment’ with AI set to change the cloud growth trajectory,” Wedbush analysts wrote Wednesday.

raw.headline: Microsoft Stock Is an AI Winner. Wall Street Isn’t ‘Fully Appreciating the Growth Story.’

headline: Rubrik Stock Is Rising. An Acquisition Will Bolster Its AI Offerings.
summary: Cybersecurity company  Rubrik  has reached an agreement to acquire the artificial-intelligence development platform Predibase, the two companies announced Wednesday.  Predibase is best known for providing open-source tools to train and customize AI models.  Rubrik stock was up 1.2% to $91.14 in Wednesday premarket trading after the announcement.

headline: Wyze Appoints Former Amazon Executive Melissa Kirmayer Eamer as President and Chief Operating Officer
summary: SEATTLE, June 25, 2025--Wyze, a company creating products that make homes smart and safe, today announced the appointment of Melissa Kirmayer Eamer as President and Chief Operating Officer. In this role, she will bring experience from consumer-centric brands, including Glossier and Amazon, to guide Wyze through its next phase of strategic growth.

headline: Inside the Complex and Petty Prenups of the Superwealthy
summary: When  Jeff Bezos  and  MacKenzie Scott  divorced in 2019, they didn’t have a prenuptial agreement to govern the division of their assets.  Now, as the world’s third-richest man prepares to marry  Lauren Sánchez  in a multiday Venetian extravaganza, onlookers can’t help but wonder whether there is a prenup and what it looks like.  A spokesman for Bezos declined to comment.

raw.headline: Inside the Complex and Petty Prenups of the Superwealthy

A spokesman for Bezos declined to comment.
